attributes.additional_details:
People on life long Anti -Coagulation such as Warfarin are not entitled to FREE Prescriptions.
Diabetics  and  people with other medical conditions ARE eligable for free prescriptions.
This is grossly unfair. Warfarin and other Anti -coagulants are given  to save life .
IN A FAIR SOCIETY HOW CAN ONE LIFE THREATENING CONDITON BE MORE SERIOUS THAN ANOTHER ?

GIVE FREE PRESCRIPTIONS TO ALL WHO DESERVE IT. THE REST OF US ARE LUCKY WE DON'T NEED IT.
